bithd_2.des: Brand new redesign and rebuild provide crypto better protection. Large amounts sends and receives, anytime and anywhere.
bithd_2.title: BITHD Watch 2
bithd_2.banner_1_subtitle:
More than optimization, It’s evolution
Brand new redesign and rebuild provide crypto better protection
bithd_2.banner_2_subtitle:
Delicate structure
12mm-thick dial (15% ↓)
26.4g metal body (28% ↓)
The dial and wrist fit perfectly
bithd_2.banner_3_subtitle:
Larger capacity, 200 mAh Battery (33% ↑)
Longer usage time, 5 weeks standby time (23% ↑)
Less charging time (38% ↓)
No need troublesome repeated charging
bithd_2.banner_4_subtitle:
Quick Fit band
Toolless assembly
Replaceable with 42/44mm bands
bithd_2.banner_5_subtitle: When battery is low, all you need to do is to simply put it on the magnetic charging base
bithd_2.banner_6_subtitle:
State-of-the-art integration of 30+ blockchains management
(BTC, ETH, EOS, USDT-ERC20/Omni, BCH, BSV, LTC, ETC, DASH, ZEC, DOGE etc.,)
Unique multi-signature (BTC, ETH, USDT-ERC20/Omni and EOS)

frozen.des:
The rock-solid ice armor provides safer protection for assets
Invulnerability to water and fire, salt and alkali resistance, and even acid resistance
frozen.banner_1_subtitle: It is not only a tool; it is an art.
frozen.banner_2_subtitle:
Aviation aluminum alloy casing with amazing hand-feel
304 stainless steel characters by unparalleled strength
frozen.banner_4_subtitle:
Saline-alkaline tolerant; acid & rust proof
Solid design and excellent materials grant you the top-notch security
frozen.banner_5_subtitle:
Double Sided:Each side stores 12 words, 24 in total
Laser engraved character tiles, clearly legible

frozen_304.des:
Forged from SUS304 steel that is invulnerable to water and fire, giving mnemonics the highest level of protection
The body can be used with passwords
frozen_304.banner_m_1_title:
Frozen Armor stainless steel plate
304 steel material
frozen_304.banner_m_1_subtitle: Can store two sets of 12 mnemonic phrases
frozen_304.banner_2_subtitle: Whole body SUS304 steel forging, melting point up to 1440℃
frozen_304.banner_3_subtitle:
Anti-rust treatment, and can effectively resist alkaline solutions and
most organic and inorganic acids
frozen_304.banner_4_title: Perfectly crafted and easy to assemble
frozen_304.banner_4_subtitle:
Comes with 96 engraved letter blocks for easy storage
12-24 mnemonics
frozen_304.banner_5_subtitle: The body can be used with a combination lock to consolidate your barriers
frozen_304.banner_6_subtitle: According to the BIP39 protocol, input 3 to 4 characters can determine the unique mnemonic. If the mnemonic has more than 4 characters, you only need to put the first 4 characters in the mnemonic board. More details: https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0039/english.txt

join.title: 網絡和系統工程師
join.subtitle: 我們正在尋找一位能夠負責網絡架構和系統管理的專業網絡和系統工程師。我們期望你能夠有效地部署和優化公司的網絡與服務器架構，並確保其穩定運作，從而保障業務流程的穩定性和整體系統的安全性。
join.r_1: 1. 根據業務發展需求，負責服務器和網絡設備的部署、改進和遷移工作。
join.r_2: 2. 執行網絡的日常維護任務，包括配置和管理防火牆、負載均衡器、交換機、路由器和VPN等關鍵網絡組件
join.r_3: 3. 實時監控網絡，分析網絡運行數據，預防網絡故障，並在出現故障時迅速定位問題並恢復服務。
join.r_4: 4. 主動響應網絡安全事件，定期審查並修補網絡設備的安全漏洞，確保系統的最新狀態和安全性。
join.r_5: 5. 5. 編制和維護詳細的網絡文檔，包括網絡拓撲圖、設備清單、布線方案和IP地址分配計劃。
join.r_6: 6. 與業務部門合作，提供技術支持，參與技術方案的規劃和評審。
join.r_7: 7. 管理IT設備的採購、記錄、更新和分配，以優化資源使用和滿足生產需求。
join.r_8: 8. 管理IDC資源的租賃週期，以及通訊設施資源的規劃和分配。
join.j_1: 1. 大專或以上學歷，計算機科學、網絡工程、通信工程等相關專業背景。
join.j_2: 2. 擁有系統集成和網絡部署項目實施經驗者優先，理想候選人應對系統集成的構建和流程有一定理解。
join.j_3: 3. 持有CCNP、Linux或相應的網絡和系統工程師資格證書者優先。
join.j_4: 4. 具備項目管理能力，能夠主動推進項目並確保按時交付。
join.j_5: 5. 良好的溝通和問題解決能力，能夠在壓力環境中保持冷靜並有效應對挑戰。
join.j_6: 6. 具備全局視角，強烈的責任感和以客戶為中心的服務意識。
join.provider: 我們可提供有競爭力的薪酬和福利，以及一個充滿挑戰和機遇的工作環境。如果您熱衷於網絡和系統工程，並且希望在一個動態且支持個人成長的團隊中工作，我們歡迎您的加入。
